All our plots are made with [plotly](https://plot.ly/) and [Highcharter](http://jkunst.com/highcharter/).

They are interactive and packed full of features. All plotly plots have a toolbar with the following features:

![](plotly_bar.png)

- Download plot as a png
- Zoom
- Pan
- Box select
- Lasso select
- Zoom in
- Zoom out
- Autoscale
- Reset axes
- Toggle spike lines
- Show closest data on hover
- Compare data on hover
- Collaborate
